verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H4082>province<s%> that went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H7628>captivity<s%>, of those which had been carried <S%H1473>away<s%>, whom <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had carried <S%H1540>away<s%> unto <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and came <S%H7725>again<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> unto his <S%H5892>city<s%>;

Which <S%H935>came<s%> with <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%>: <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>, <S%H5166>Nehemiah<s%>, <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%>, <S%H7480>Reelaiah<s%>, <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%>, <S%H1114>Bilshan<s%>, <S%H4558>Mispar<s%>, <S%H902>Bigvai<s%>, <S%H7348>Rehum<s%>, <S%H1196>Baanah<s%>. The <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6355>Pahath-moab<s%>, of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%> and <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%>.
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, a <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%>.

¶ The <S%H3548>priests<s%>: the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%>, of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>, <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%>.

¶ The <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%> and <S%H6934>Kadmiel<s%>, of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1938>Hodaviah<s%>, <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%>.

¶ The <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H7778>porters<s%>: the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H333>Ater<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2929>Talmon<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6126>Akkub<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2410>Hatita<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7630>Shobai<s%>, in all an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%>.
¶ The <S%H5411>Nethinims<s%>: the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6727>Ziha<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2817>Hasupha<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2884>Tabbaoth<s%>,
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7026>Keros<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5517>Siaha<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6303>Padon<s%>,
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3838>Lebanah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2286>Hagabah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6126>Akkub<s%>,
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2285>Hagab<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8073>Shalmai<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2605>Hanan<s%>,
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1435>Giddel<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1515>Gahar<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7211>Reaiah<s%>,
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7526>Rezin<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5353>Nekoda<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1502>Gazzam<s%>,
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5798>Uzza<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6454>Paseah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1153>Besai<s%>,
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H619>Asnah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4586>Mehunim<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5300%H5304>Nephusim<s%>,
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1227>Bakbuk<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2709>Hakupha<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2744>Harhur<s%>,
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1213>Bazluth<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4240>Mehida<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2797>Harsha<s%>,
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1302>Barkos<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8547>Thamah<s%>,

¶ The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%>: the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5479>Sotai<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5618>Sophereth<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6514>Peruda<s%>,
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3279>Jaalah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1874>Darkon<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1435>Giddel<s%>,

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2411>Hattil<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of Pochereth of <S%H6380>Zebaim<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H532>Ami<s%>.
All the <S%H5411>Nethinims<s%>, and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%>, were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%>.

And these were they which went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H8528>Tel-melah<s%>, <S%H8521>Tel-harsa<s%>, <S%H3743>Cherub<s%>, <S%H135>Addan<s%>, and <S%H564>Immer<s%>: but they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5046>shew<s%> their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and their <S%H2233>seed<s%>, whether they were of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1806>Delaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5353>Nekoda<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%>.

¶ And of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>: the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2252>Habaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6976>Koz<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%>; which <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%>, and was <S%H7121>called<s%> after their <S%H8034>name<s%>:

These <S%H1245>sought<s%> their <S%H3791>register<s%> among those that were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogy<s%>, but they were not <S%H4672>found<s%>: therefore were they, as <S%H1351>polluted<s%>, put from the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%>.

And the <S%H8660>Tirshatha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, that they should not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, till there stood <S%H5975>up<s%> a <S%H3548>priest<s%> with <S%H224>Urim<s%> and with <S%H8550>Thummim<s%>.
¶ The whole <S%H6951>congregation<s%> <S%H259>together<s%> was <S%H702%H7239>forty<s%> and two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>threescore<s%>,

Beside their <S%H5650>servants<s%> and their <S%H519>maids<s%>, of whom there were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%>: and there <S%H428>were<s%> among them two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> singing <S%H7891>men<s%> and singing <S%H7891>women<s%>.

Their <S%H5483>horses<s%> were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%>; their <S%H6505>mules<s%>, two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%>;

¶ And some of the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>, when they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which is at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, offered <S%H5068>freely<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to set it <S%H5975>up<s%> in his <S%H4349>place<s%>:

They <S%H5414>gave<s%> after their <S%H3581>ability<s%> unto the <S%H214>treasure<s%> of the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H8337%H7239>threescore<s%> and one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1871>drams<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H4488>pound<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3548>priests'<s%> <S%H3801>garments<s%>.

So the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and some of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, and the <S%H7778>porters<s%>, and the <S%H5411>Nethinims<s%>, <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
